mapper.sql: a.ID as id, a.ACCOUNT_ID as accountId, a.CONTACT_NUMBER as contactNumber, a.CONTACT_NUMBER_TYPE as contactNumberType, a.COUNTRY as country, a.CREATED_BY as createdBy, a.CREATED_DATE as createdDate, a.UPDATED_BY as updatedBy, a.UPDATED_DATE as updatedDate
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ACCOUNT_PER_CONTACT( ID , ACCOUNT_ID , CONTACT_NUMBER , CONTACT_NUMBER_TYPE , COUNTRY , CREATED_BY , CREATED_DATE , UPDATED_BY , UPDATED_DATE ) VALUES ( #{id} , #{accountId} , #{contactNumber} , #{contactNumberType} , #{country} , #{createdBy} , #{createdDate} , #{updatedBy} , #{updatedDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ACCOUNT_PER_CONTACT SET DEL_FLAG = 1 WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ACCOUNT_PER_CONTACT
ID ,
ACCOUNT_ID ,
CONTACT_NUMBER ,
CONTACT_NUMBER_TYPE ,
COUNTRY ,
CREATED_BY ,
CREATED_DATE ,
UPDATED_BY ,
UPDATED_DATE
#{id} ,
#{accountId} ,
#{contactNumber} ,
#{contactNumberType} ,
#{country} ,
#{createdBy} ,
#{createdDate} ,
#{updatedBy} ,

mapper.update:
UPDATE ACCOUNT_PER_CONTACT
ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId} ,
CONTACT_NUMBER = #{contactNumber} ,
CONTACT_NUMBER_TYPE = #{contactNumberType} ,
COUNTRY = #{country} ,
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy} ,
CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate} ,
UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy} ,
UPDATED_DATE = #{updatedDate}
WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ACCOUNT_PER_CONTACT( ID , ACCOUNT_ID , CONTACT_NUMBER , CONTACT_NUMBER_TYPE , COUNTRY , CREATED_BY , CREATED_DATE , UPDATED_BY , UPDATED_DATE )
SELECT #{item.id} , #{item.accountId} , #{item.contactNumber} , #{item.contactNumberType} , #{item.country} , #{item.createdBy} , #{item.createdDate} , #{item.updatedBy} , #{item.updatedDate} FROM DUAL

update.foreach: UPDATE ACCOUNT_PER_CONTACT SET ACCOUNT_ID = #{item.accountId} , CONTACT_NUMBER = #{item.contactNumber} , CONTACT_NUMBER_TYPE = #{item.contactNumberType} , COUNTRY = #{item.country} , CREATED_BY = #{item.createdBy} , CREATED_DATE = #{item.createdDate} , UPDATED_BY = #{item.updatedBy} , UPDATED_DATE = #{item.updatedDate} WHERE ID = #{item.id}

mapper.update: UPDATE ACCOUNT_PER_CONTACT SET ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId} , CONTACT_NUMBER = #{contactNumber} , CONTACT_NUMBER_TYPE = #{contactNumberType} , COUNTRY = #{country} , CREATED_BY = #{createdBy} , CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate} , UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy} , UPDATED_DATE = #{updatedDate} WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM ACCOUNT_PER_CONTACT a WHERE a.ID = #{id}

SELECT
FROM ACCOUNT_PER_CONTACT a WHERE a.DEL_FLAG = 0
